mapper.insert: insert into User (user_id, user_name, user_password, user_type, user_qq) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userQq,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, user_password, user_type, user_qq from User where user_name=#{userName}
select user_id, user_name, user_password, user_type, user_qq from User
